en.template: <Account :to="from"/> withdraw staked {{quantity}}

zh.template: <Account :to="from"/> 赎回了质押的 {{quantity}}

en.template: <Account :to="creator"/> created new account <Account :to="name"/>

zh.template: <Account :to="creator"/> 创建了账户 <Account :to="name"/>

en.template: <Account :to="payer"/> bought {{bytes}} bytes RAM for <Account :to="receiver"/>

zh.template: <Account :to="payer"/> 为 <Account :to="receiver"/> 购买了 {{bytes}} bytes内存

en.template: <Account :to="payer"/> bought {{quant}} RAM for <Account :to="receiver"/>

zh.template: <Account :to="payer"/> 为 <Account :to="receiver"/> 购买了价值 {{quant}} 的内存

en.template: <Account :to="account" /> sold <Quantity :num="bytes"/> bytes RAM

zh.template: <Account :to="account" /> 卖出了 <Quantity :num="bytes"/> bytes的内存

en.template:
<If :condition="transfer"><Account :to="from"/> delegated for <Account :to="receiver"/> {{stake_net_quantity}} in Net and {{stake_cpu_quantity}} in CPU, with EOS transferred.</If>
          <If :not="transfer"><Account :to="from"/> delegated for <Account :to="receiver"/> {{stake_net_quantity}} in Net and {{stake_cpu_quantity}} in CPU, without EOS transferred.</If>

zh.template:
<If :condition="transfer"><Account :to="from"/> 为 <Account :to="receiver"/> 抵押了价值 {{stake_net_quantity}} 的带宽和价值 {{stake_cpu_quantity}} 的CPU，并转移了EOS</If>
          <If :not="transfer"><Account :to="from"/> 为 <Account :to="receiver"/> 抵押了价值 {{stake_net_quantity}} 的带宽和价值 {{stake_cpu_quantity}} 的CPU，未转移EOS</If>

en.template: <Account :to="from" /> unstaked from the account <Account :to="receiver" /> {{unstake_net_quantity}} for Net and {{unstake_cpu_quantity}} for CPU

zh.template: <Account :to="from" /> 赎回了之前为 <Account :to="receiver" /> 抵押的价值 {{unstake_net_quantity}} 的带宽和价值 {{unstake_cpu_quantity}} 的CPU

en.template: Contract code deployed to <Contract :to="account" />

zh.template: <Contract :to="account" /> 部署了一个智能合约

en.template: Contract ABI deployed to <Contract :to="account" />

zh.template: <Contract :to="account" /> 部署了一个智能合约的ABI接口

en.template: <Account :to="account" /> updated permission group {{permission}} <Highlight :json="auth"/>

zh.template: <Account :to="account" /> 将其 {{permission}} 权限更新为 <Highlight :json="auth"/>

en.template: <Account :to="producer" /> updated BP info, with <Highlight :json="action.data"/>

zh.template: <Account :to="producer" /> 更新了节点信息 <Highlight :json="action.data"/>

en.template: <Account :to="producer" /> unregistered Producer

zh.template: <Account :to="producer" /> 注销了其节点身份

en.template:
<If :condition="isproxy"><Account :to="proxy" /> registered as a proxy</If>
          <If :not="isproxy"><Account :to="proxy" /> unregistered as a proxy</If>

zh.template:
<If :condition="isproxy"><Account :to="proxy" /> 注册了代理身份</If>
          <If :not="isproxy"><Account :to="proxy" /> 注销了代理身份</If>

en.template: <Account :to="bidder" /> bid {{bid}} for the name <Account :to="newname"/>

zh.template: <Account :to="bidder" /> 以 {{bid}} 的价格竞拍账号 <Account :to="newname"/>

en.template:
<If :condition="proxy"><Account :to="voter" /> delegate the votes to <Account :to="proxy" /></If>
          <If :not="proxy"><Account :to="voter" /> voted to <Accounts :accounts="producers"/></If>

zh.template:
<If :condition="proxy"><Account :to="voter" /> 将票委托给了代理 <Account :to="proxy" /></If>
          <If :not="proxy"><Account :to="voter" /> 投票给了 <Accounts :accounts="producers"/></If>

en.template: <Account :to="owner"/> claimed rewards

zh.template: <Account :to="owner"/> 申领了奖励

en.template: <Account :to="account" />'s permission group {{requirement}} is authorized to access <ActionInterface :account="code" :name="type"/>

zh.template: <Account :to="account" /> 授权其 {{requirement}} 权限组可以访问 <ActionInterface :account="code" :name="type"/>

en.template: <Account :to="account" />'s permission group prohibited to access contract <ActionInterface :account="code" :name="type"/>

zh.template: <Account :to="account" /> 取消了相关权限组访问 <ActionInterface :account="code" :name="type"/> 的权限

zh.template: <Transfer :from="from" :to="to" :quantity="quantity" :contract="action.account" :memo="memo"/>

zh.template: 系统增发了 <Token :quantity="quantity" contract="eosio.token"/> 给 <Account :to="to" /> <Memo>{{memo}}</Memo>

zh.template: <Account :to='maker'/>以价格{{price}} 卖出 <Token :quantity='quantity' :contract='ask_contract'/> 订单来源:{{source}}, 订单编号:{{uuid}}

en.template: <Account :to='maker'/> cancel the order that Identity Number is: {{uuid}}, scope is {{scope}}
